Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Doctorate \Doc"tor*ate\, n. [Cf. F. doctorat.] The degree, title, or rank, of a doctor. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Doctorate \Doc"tor*ate\, v. t. To make (one) a doctor. [1913 Webster]
He was bred . . . in Oxford and there doctorated. -- Fuller. [1913 Webster]
doctorate n : one of the highest academic degrees conferred by a university [syn: {doctor's degree}]
